short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tweet in one click within Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Really simple and fast way of sharing the current website you are looking at on twitter

- Click the extension icon and automatically tweet the current website link
- Share a blog post, a tweet, or any website you are viewing
- The website is automatically included in your tweet, modify the tweet with any message you want before tweeting
- The tweet window will automatically close after tweeting
- No need to add permissions to twitter, just login to twitter and tweet
